creator: Vritti Solutions Ltd
descriptionHtml:
Simplify Practice is an innovative and value for money productivity tool that can help the business do the following
Assign/Allocate the work.
Track the achievement on Daily basis against the work assigned

Get the project-wise status report (Completed, Delayed, Pending etc.)
Get the time sheet and attendance
Resource allocation and Resource Utilization
